metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14446 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: MP4Integer32Property::Read in atom_avcC.cpp in MP4v2 2.1.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted MP4 file.

criterions.comment: mp4v2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
